name: ADJ01PlayerState
doc:
ADJ01PlayerState

     Base player state class used by this project.
     玩家状态类，持有玩家的 AbilitySystemComponent。
     在Lyra架构中，ASC由PlayerState持有而非Pawn，这样可以在Pawn死亡/重生时保持技能状态。

AbilitySystemComponent: 玩家的 AbilitySystemComponent，用于管理技能、属性和效果

methods.name: AddStatTagStack
methods.doc: Adds a specified number of stacks to the tag (does nothing if StackCount is below 1)

methods.name: GetSquadId
methods.doc: Returns the Squad ID of the squad the player belongs to.

methods.name: GetStatTagStackCount
methods.doc: Returns the stack count of the specified tag (or 0 if the tag is not present)

methods.name: GetTeamId
methods.doc: Returns the Team ID of the team the player belongs to.

methods.name: HasStatTag
methods.doc: Returns true if there is at least one stack of the specified tag

methods.name: RemoveStatTagStack
methods.doc: Removes a specified number of stacks from the tag (does nothing if StackCount is below 1)
